item.title: Migrate Springboot2 to Springboot3
item.description: Official document： https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/wiki/Spring-Boot-3.0-Migration-Guide Others document: https://docs.openrewrite.org/recipes/java/spring/boot3 https://www.baeldung.com/spring-boot-3-migration https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/574266547 https://www.cnblogs.com/lzfhope/p/16444613.html https://www.zhihu.com/question/61385975 Official Tools for Spring Boot3 migration Spring Boot Migrator (SBM) https://github.com/spring-projects-experimental/spring-boot-migrator PS: need to build this tool locally, because the latest release version was too old and there are some bugs were fixed in the latest source code. git checkout 0.15.2 mvn clean install -DskipTests Then the jar file will be created
